original_text: And when he came upon the stairs, so it was, that he was borne of the soldiers for the violence of the people.
korean_text: 바울이 층대에 이를 때에 무리의 폭행으로 말미암아 군사들에게 들려가니

sentences.original_text: And when he came upon the stairs
that he was borne of the soldiers
for the violence of the people
